sentences.kr: 만약 수량을 늘리신다면 할인을 제공할 수 있습니다. (v1)
sentences.en: If you increase the quantity, we could offer a discount. (variant 1)
I'd like to hear your requirements. (variant 1)
We propose the following terms. (variant 1)
Let's find a mutually beneficial solution. (variant 1)
We have some flexibility in this matter. (variant 1)
Let's discuss the contract terms. (variant 1)
We'll do our best within your budget range. (variant 1)
Let me suggest an alternative. (variant 1)
Would you consider this proposal? (variant 1)
This is a fair deal for both parties. (variant 1)
